# Spinner Component

### Spinner

**Exports:**
- `Spinner` - Loading spinner component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Spinner } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<Spinner />
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/spinner for full documentation and examples.
